project_descr: Communities and Institutions have established preparedness mechanisms and partnerships to effectively respond to and recover from the impact of disasters.

outputs.output_descr: Technical support to central and state governments to strengthen disaster management institutions to carry out disaster risk reduction initiatives.
Rebuilding Livelihoods-Fisheries/Non Fisheries/Tsunami Dalit/Boat Repair & Boat Safety

Settlement and habitat planning in the flood-affected Kosi region of Bihar with a disaster risk reduction focus and setting up of rural hubs providing access to poor people who have lost their shelter by making available guidelines, technologies and more importantly material and choices for reconstruction of houses.
Support preparation and adoption of action plan for implementation disaster risk reduction programme at Centre, State and local levels in selected urban and rural locations.

The project will reach out to water scarce communities in 200 villages of Pali, Barner and Jodhpur districts of Rajasthan to address the water related vulnerabilities of the people.  The project will create water harvesting structures and capacities based on community participation and ownership.

project_title: preparedness mechanism to recover from disasters
